front.title: Deactivate The Shield Generator
front.gametext: Deploy on Bunker. Once during your control phase, if you control Bunker with a Rebel, you may attempt to 'blow away' Bunker as follows: Charges! Come On, Come On!: Draw two destiny. Add 3 to total for each Explosive Charge on Bunker. Move! Move! Move!: If total destiny > 12, your characters here may relocate to Back Door for free, Bunker and Landing Platform (if on table) are 'blown away,' opponent loses 8 Force and this card is lost.

combo: Deactivate The Shield Generator+ Major Hewex
Deactivate The Shield Generator + Throw Me Another Charge Adds 1 to Deactivate The Shield Generator total.
